author: Mathias Bengt Alsenalissa
description: “I wanted to make a drink that is very easy to reproduce around the world and equally easy to like; I also wanted to make something inspired by the rich history of BACARDÍ. With all the challenges and new chapters BACARDÍ has faced, the expression ‘turning over a new leaf’ fits very well. One of the latest ’new leaves’ for BACARDÍ is their acquisition of ‘St Germain’, which is why I wanted to incorporate it into my drink. Oregano leaves tie it all together; name, drink, history and creativity: Turning Leaves.”
name: Turning Leaves
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE oregano and cucumber in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
